description:
Asai runs in panic towards Kurokan. They see parents with the senior students walking towards the principalâ€™s office. 
The parents` intention is to fire Kurokan!
Although other teachers tried to help Kurokan with all of their power, the principal is under the pressure of the parents. 
Reporter Koshimitsu has heard of Kurokan`s leaving. He thinks it`s Kurokan`s strategy to disrupt other schools.
Koshimizu uses an interview as an excuse to take pictures of Sakamato doing pitches and secretly gives the pictures to Morioka.
Source: crunchyroll
